name: Magical Novice
desc: Though not a full-fledged practitioner of the magical arts, you've dabbled enough to cast a small number of spells.
effects_desc: * You learn two cantrips from the spell list of your choice: bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard.

* You learn one first level spell from the same spell list. You may cast this spell once, and you cannot cast it again until you complete a long rest. This spell cannot be cast at a higher level than first.

* If you chose the wizard spell list, then Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells. If you chose the cleric or druid list, your spellcasting ability is Wisdom. If you chose the bard, sorcerer, or warlock spell list, then your spellcasting ability is Charisma.
